info.name: LLM Marketplace - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for the LLM Marketplace backend service including Authentication, Products, Messages, and Image Upload APIs. This collection includes UUID-based entities, JWT tokens with industry-standard 'sub' claims, S3 image storage, and Tinder-style messaging system.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user in the marketplace. Creates a user with UUID and returns user details. All passwords are bcrypt hashed with 10 salt rounds.
Authenticate user and receive JWT tokens. Returns access token (1-hour expiry) and refresh token (7-day expiry). JWT includes industry-standard 'sub' claim with user UUID.
Refresh an expired access token using the refresh token. Returns a new access token with 1-hour expiry.
Logout user by revoking the refresh token. This invalidates the token and prevents further use.

item.description: User authentication endpoints with UUID-based users and JWT tokens including industry-standard 'sub' claims

request.description: Update an existing product. Only the seller can update their own products. Supports partial updates - only include fields you want to change.
Delete (mark as removed) a product. Only the seller can delete their own products. This also deletes all associated images from S3.

item.description: Product CRUD operations with category validation, image support, search and filtering capabilities

item.name: Images

formdata.description: Select an image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF - max 5MB)
UUID of the product to upload image for
Display order for the image (optional, default: 0)

request.description: Upload a single image to a product. The image will be stored in S3 with automatic UUID generation and a signed URL will be returned for immediate access.

formdata.description: UUID of the product to upload images for

request.description: Upload multiple images to a product at once. Maximum 10 images per request. Each image will be automatically assigned a display order based on upload sequence.
Retrieve all images for a specific product with signed URLs for secure access. Images are ordered by display_order and creation time.
Set a specific image as the preview/thumbnail image for a product. This image will be used as the main image in product listings.
Reorder images for a product by setting new display_order values. Lower numbers appear first in the gallery.
Delete an image from both S3 storage and the database. If the deleted image was the preview image, the preview will be cleared.

item.description: Image upload and management with S3 storage, signed URLs, and comprehensive file validation

item.name: Messages (Tinder-Style)

request.description: Send an initial message from buyer to seller about a specific product. This follows Tinder/Hinge style where each buyer can send only one initial message per product. Seller receives email notification with enhanced error handling and retry logic.

response.name: Success Response (Email Delivered)

request.description: Seller accepts or rejects a buyer's initial message (Tinder-style matching). Once accepted, both parties can engage in further communication. Status can be 'accepted' or 'rejected'.
Seller rejects a buyer's initial message. This closes the communication channel for this specific product-buyer-seller combination.

query.description: UUID of the seller to verify ownership

request.description: Get all messages for a specific product that the seller owns. Messages are ordered by status (pending first, then accepted, then rejected) and creation time. Only the product owner can view these messages.
